ability: cholorotoxin immobilizes the target preventing abilities and attacks, counters decrement each turn and cannot stack
mild poison deals 1 damage per turn, counters persist and stack throughout the entire battle
batrachotoxin deals 30 damage per turn, counters persist and stack throughout the entire battle
hive durability revives the target with full health whenever it '[url=faints][color=light_yellow]faints[/color][/url]', counters decrement each use and stack up to a maximum of 2 counters

shoal counters revive the '[url=AtlanticBluefinTuna][color=coral]AtlanticBluefinTuna[/color][/url]' to 50% of their max health,'[url=AtlanticHerring][color=coral]AtlanticHerring[/color][/url]' to 33% of their max health, and all other recruits to 25% of their max health, counters decrement each use and stack

airborne counters provide evasion and damage reduction depending on the altitude of the recruit. '[url=AndeanCondor][color=coral]AndeanCondor[/color][/url]' recruits have 75% evasion and 75% damage reduction while airborne. '[url=GriffonVulture][color=coral]GriffonVulture[/color][/url]' recruits have 100% evasion and 100% damage reduction while airborne. All other recruits have 50% evasion and 50% damage reduction while airborne. Counters decrement each use and stack
acrid slime skin counters weaken enemy's, counters persist and stack throughout the entire battle

thick blubber counters reduce damage multiply the incoming damage by 0.97 each, or approximately reduce it by ~3% per counter (5/10/15 counters are respectively 14%/26%/37% reduction in damage), counters persist and stack throughout the entire battle
Tetrodotoxin counters deal 1 damage and reduce recruits stats by -0/-1/-1/0/-1, counters persist and stack throughout the entire battle
flock counters increase the number of attacks done by this recruit by 1 each, counters persist and stack throughout the entire battle
cytotoxin counters deal x^2 damage where x is the stack count, counters decrement each turn but stack
entangled web counters prevent a recruit from attacking the next turn, counters decrement each turn and cannot stack
submerged counters increase stats by +1/+1/+0/+1/+1 per counter, counters are removed after one melee attack
protected counters prevent all damage (melee/ranged), counters decrement each turn and cannot stack
ink spray counters temporarily reduce recruits attacks by -1/-1/-0/-0/-0 (melee/ranged), counters decrement each turn by 2 but can stack
neurotoxic peptides counters reduce all attacks (ranged or melee) by 1, additionally counters deal 1% of the max health of the target recruit, counters persist throughout battle but cannot stack
coral reef counters prevent 1 damage each. Remove 1 counter per damage prevented, counters persist throughout battle and stack

deal 3 unblockable damage to the enemy whenever '[url=attacked by recruit][color=light_yellow]attacked by recruit[/color][/url]' (in melee or range), counters persist and stack throughout the entire battle
burrowed counters prevent 20 ranged damage each, counter persist throughout battle and stack
shell armor counters prevent 3 damage each. Remove 1 counter per 3 damage prevented, counters persist throughout battle and stack
mollusk mucus counters heal 1 health and increase stats by +1/+1/+0/+0/+0 for each counter on this, counters persist throughout battle and stack

strips 1 armor from the enemy for each counter whenever the recruit with these counter(s) '[url=attacks a recruit][color=light_yellow]attacks a recruit[/color][/url]' (in melee or range), counters persist throughout battle and stack

ability: vengeance counters prevent recruits from fainting, counters decrement each time used but stack
skunk spray counters temporarily reduce the attack of recruits (besides HoodedSkunk) by 10%, counters decrement each time the recruit attacks but do not stack while the target is inflicted
camouflage counters prevent recruits from targeting this recruit by ranged attacks and increase incoming melee damage by 25%, counters persist throughout battle but do not stack
entrenched dugout counters reduce incoming ranged damage by 1 per counter, counters persist throughout battle and stack to a maximum value of 300
incendiary material counters increase fire damage by 2x, counters decrement by 2 each turn but stack
carapace counters cap incoming blockable damage at 25 after use, counters decrement when used and stack
